data.description: Handling of GnuPG encrypted / signed mails
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Hi,

    this is my second attempt to get this module registered. In the
    meantime I got response of several people using it, which affirm
    that it has major advantages over the other PGP related modules in
    CPAN. I'd appreciate if the module could be registered offically in
    CPAN.

    Thanks.

    Joern
